ai-tha-ap260:1.1_0: “The Himalayas are falling from the Himalayas,
ai-tha-ap260:1.2_0: I’m the one who bursts out my eyes.
ai-tha-ap260:2.2_0: the Siddhattha would come to me,
ai-tha-ap260:2.3_0: I directly gave you the Buddha
ai-tha-ap260:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap260:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap260:4.2_0: I was the King in need.
ai-tha-ap260:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Puṇṇaka.
ai-tha-ap260:7.1_0: for the eighth Elder Nun Puṇṇaka
